Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Adding "resume" lifecycle event" (#1778) at vuejs/vue-router
Events.RelatedBody:
### What problem does this feature solve?
Just a thought: Would it not be nice to have a "resume" lifecycle in vue-router? So adding an event callback by jumping back to a visited component?

### What does the proposed API look like?
Just like "mounted" or "created".
